properties.title: Swiss National Museum Prangins
properties.abstract: Prangins Castle is located in a superb setting dominating Lake Geneva. It features one of Switzerland's largest old-fashioned vegetable gardens and a French-style park, as well as the daily life of Swiss people in the 18th and 19th century.
properties.description: This beautiful building overlooking Lake Geneva is a listed historic monument and now a history museum. Some forty well-documented rooms portray the life in Switzerland from 1750 to 1920. Apart from special features, such as the Bréguet pendulum clock, the hail cannon and a section presenting colonial foods, visitors can discover varied topics related to the economy, education, health, tourism and emigration. The Prangins site also offers a romantic park, as well as one of the largest old-fashioned vegetable gardens in Switzerland.
properties.name: Musée national suisse, Château de Prangins
